statements: SELECT * FROM EventInvitations WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM EventInvitations WHERE organizer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM EventInvitations WHERE attendee_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM EventInvitations WHERE invitation_status = 'Pending';
SELECT event_name, organizer_name, attendee_name FROM EventInvitations WHERE event_date > '2021-12-31';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM EventInvitations WHERE organizer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM EventInvitations WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT attendee_id, attendee_name, attendee_email FROM EventInvitations WHERE invitation_status = 'Accepted';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT event_id) AS total_events, invitation_status FROM EventInvitations GROUP BY invitation_status;
SELECT event_name, attendee_name FROM EventInvitations WHERE organizer_name = 'Jane Smith' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM invitations WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM invitations WHERE status = 'confirmed';
SELECT attendee_name, email, past_interactions FROM attendees;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM invitations WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT attendee_name, email, past_interactions FROM attendees WHERE preference = 'VIP';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM invitations WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, email, preference FROM attendees WHERE preference = 'VIP' ORDER BY attendee_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, attendee_name, status FROM invitations JOIN attendees ON invitations.attendee_id = attendees.attendee_id WHERE status = 'confirmed' ORDER BY event_name, attendee_name;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT event_id) AS total_events, COUNT(DISTINCT attendee_id) AS total_attendees FROM invitations;
SELECT AVG(past_interactions) AS avg_interactions, MAX(past_interactions) AS max_interactions, MIN(past_interactions) AS min_interactions FROM attendees;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT name, email FROM participants WHERE preference = 'Option A';
SELECT event_name, location, date FROM events WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT participant_id, event_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE preference='workshop' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT participant_id, name, email FROM participants WHERE participant_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT event_id, location, date FROM events WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND interaction_type='registration';

SELECT p.name, e.event_name, i.interaction_type FROM participants p JOIN interactions i ON p.participant_id = i.participant_id JOIN events e ON i.event_id = e.event_id WHERE i.interaction_date >= '2022-07-01';
SELECT * FROM attendees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM attendees;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM events;
SELECT attendee_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM attendees;
SELECT event_id, event_name, location FROM events;
SELECT * FROM attendees WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT attendee_id, first_name, last_name FROM attendees ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, location FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT a.first_name, a.last_name, i.interaction_type FROM attendees a INNER JOIN interactions i ON a.attendee_id = i.attendee_id WHERE i.interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT attendee_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY attendee_id HAVING total_interactions > 5 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM event_attendees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM event_attendees ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, location, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT attendee_id, preference_category, preference_value FROM attendee_preferences WHERE attendee_id = 1001;
SELECT event_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM past_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM event_attendees WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM attendee_preferences WHERE attendee_id = 100 AND preference_category = 'Food';
SELECT avg(DATEDIFF(interaction_date, CURDATE())) as avg_days_since_interaction FROM past_interactions;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_attendees FROM event_attendees WHERE event_id = 2 AND first_name LIKE 'A%';
